mapper.select: SELECT m.marketyear, m.marketquarter, b.district, m.service_codename, m.marketquartersales, m.marketquartercount, m.marketofstores FROM market m JOIN bd_codelist b ON m.bd_code = b.bd_code AND service_codename = '패스트푸드점'

SELECT m.marketyear, m.marketquarter, b.district, m.service_codename, m.marketquartersales, m.marketquartercount, m.marketofstores FROM market m JOIN bd_codelist b ON m.bd_code = b.bd_code AND m.service_codename = '패스트푸드점' AND b.district = #{district, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT b.district FROM market m, bd_codeList b WHERE m.bd_codename = #{bd_codename} AND m.bd_code = b.bd_code GROUP BY b.district

SELECT m.marketyear, m.marketquarter, b.district, m.service_codename, m.marketquartersales, m.marketquartercount, m.marketofstores FROM market m JOIN bd_codelist b ON m.bd_code = b.bd_code AND m.service_codename = '패스트푸드점' AND b.district = #{district} AND m.marketyear = 2021 AND m.marketquarter = 1 AND ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT marketyear, marketquarter, ROUND(AVG(marketquartersales), -1) AS MARKETQUARTERSALES, ROUND(AVG(marketquartercount), -1) AS MARKETQUARTERCOUNT, ROUND(AVG(marketofstores) , 2) AS MARKETOFSTORES FROM (SELECT m.marketyear, m.marketquarter, b.district, m.service_codename, m.marketquartersales, m.marketquartercount, m.marketofstores FROM market m, bd_codelist b WHERE m.service_codename = '패스트푸드점' AND b.district = #{district}) GROUP BY marketyear, marketquarter ORDER BY marketyear DESC
